mapper.select: select u.*,r.sys_roleName,r.sys_roleDesc from sys_user u left join sys_user_role sur on u.sys_userId=sur.sys_userId left join sys_role r on r.sys_roleId=sur.sys_roleId where sys_userJobNumber = #{sysUserjobnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
